Package database_CRUD

Class AppointmentsCRUD

java.lang.Object
database_CRUD.AppointmentsCRUD
public class AppointmentsCRUD extends Object
This class contains all of the methods used to perform operations on the Appointments database table. This includes Create (Insert), Read (Retrieve), Update, and Delete operations.

  • Method Details

    • getAllAppointmentsFromDatabase

      public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Appointments> getAllAppointmentsFromDatabase()
      This method retrieves all records from the database's Appointments table.
      Returns:
      Returns an Observable List filled with Appointments objects (each Appointments object represents an appointment record from the database)

    • getThisMonthsAppointmentsFromDatabase

      public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Appointments> getThisMonthsAppointmentsFromDatabase()
      This method retrieves all of the current month's appointments from the Appointments database table.
      Returns:
      Returns an Observable List filled with Appointments objects (each Appointments object represents an appointment record from the database)

    • getThisWeeksAppointmentsFromDatabase

      public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Appointments> getThisWeeksAppointmentsFromDatabase()
      This method retrieves all of the current week's appointments from the Appointments database table. A "week" is considered to be Sunday to Saturday, inclusive.
      Returns:
      Returns an Observable List filled with Appointments objects (each Appointments object represents an appointment record from the database)

    • getAnyOverlappingAppointmentsFromDatabase

      public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Appointments> getAnyOverlappingAppointmentsFromDatabase(LocalDateTime startDateTime, LocalDateTime endDateTime, int customerID)
      This method retrieves all appointments from the Appointments database table that belong to the given customer (whose ID was input as a parameter) and overlap with the given time range (which is input as the startDateTime and endDateTime parameters).
      Parameters:
      startDateTime - The start date and time of the time range during which any overlapping appointments will be retrieved
      endDateTime - The end date and time of the time range during which any overlapping appointments will be retrieved
      customerID - The ID of the customer whose overlapping appointments will be retrieved
      Returns:
      Returns an Observable List filled with Appointments objects (each Appointments object represents an appointment record from the database)

    • getFromDatabaseTheUsersAppointmentsThatStartWithinTheNextFifteenMinutes

      public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Appointments> getFromDatabaseTheUsersAppointmentsThatStartWithinTheNextFifteenMinutes(int userID)
      This method retrieves all appointments from the Appointments database table that involve a particular user (whose ID was input as a parameter) and occur within the next fifteen minutes (from the current time).
      Parameters:
      userID - The ID of the user whose appointments will be retrieved
      Returns:
      Returns an Observable List filled with Appointments objects (each Appointments object represents an appointment record from the database)

    • getFromDatabaseAllAppointmentsInvolvingACertainContact

      public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Appointments> getFromDatabaseAllAppointmentsInvolvingACertainContact(int contactID)
      This method retrieves all appointments from the Appointments database table that involve a particular contact (whose ID was input as a parameter).
      Parameters:
      contactID - The ID of the contact whose appointments will be retrieved
      Returns:
      Returns an Observable List filled with Appointments objects (each Appointments object represents an appointment record from the database)

    • getFromDatabaseTheAppointmentTotalForEachCustomer

      public static ArrayList<Integer> getFromDatabaseTheAppointmentTotalForEachCustomer()
      This method returns the number of appointments currently scheduled for each and every customer that is in the database.
      Returns:
      Returns an Integer ArrayList. The elements of said ArrayList alternate - the first element contains the ID of a particular customer, the second element contains the number of appointments currently scheduled for that customer, the third element contains the ID of a different customer, the fourth element contains the number of appointments currently scheduled for that customer, and so on.

    • getFromDatabaseTheTotalForEachTypeOfAppointmentInAParticularMonth

      public static ArrayList<String> getFromDatabaseTheTotalForEachTypeOfAppointmentInAParticularMonth(int monthNum)
      This method calculate how many of each type of appointment there is for the given month (whose month number was input as a parameter).
      Parameters:
      monthNum - A number (from 1 - 12) indicating which month to use
      Returns:
      Returns a String ArrayList. The elements of said ArrayList alternate - the first element contains the name of a type of appointment, the second element contains the number of appointments of that type that are scheduled for the current month, the third element contains the name of a different type of appointment, the fourth element contains the number of appointments of that type that are scheduled for the current month, and so on.

    • addAppointmentToDatabase

      public static int addAppointmentToDatabase(String appointmentName, String appointmentDescription, String appointmentLocation, String appointmentType, LocalDate appointmentStartDate, LocalDate appointmentEndDate, String appointmentStartTime, String appointmentEndTime, int idOfCustomerInvolved, int idOfUserInCharge, int idOfContactInvolved)
      This method adds a new record to the database's Appointments table; the details of this record (as in, the various column values for this record) are input as parameters into this method.
      Parameters:
      appointmentName - The title of the new appointment
      appointmentDescription - The description of the new appointment
      appointmentLocation - The location of the new appointment
      appointmentType - The type of the new appointment
      appointmentStartDate - The start date of the new appointment
      appointmentEndDate - The end date of the new appointment
      appointmentStartTime - The start time of the new appointment in the format HH:MM:SS.ns (this is 24-hour time; "ns" stands for "nanoseconds").
      appointmentEndTime - The end time of the new appointment in the format HH:MM:SS.ns (this is 24-hour time; "ns" stands for "nanoseconds").
      idOfCustomerInvolved - The customer ID of the customer involved in this new appointment
      idOfUserInCharge - The user ID of the user in charge of this new appointment
      idOfContactInvolved - The contact ID of the contact involved in this new appointment
      Returns:
      Returns the number of table rows affected (added) in the database

    • modifyAppointmentInDatabase

      public static int modifyAppointmentInDatabase(int appointmentID, String appointmentName, String appointmentDescription, String appointmentLocation, String appointmentType, LocalDate appointmentStartDate, LocalDate appointmentEndDate, String appointmentStartTime, String appointmentEndTime, int idOfCustomerInvolved, int idOfUserInCharge, int idOfContactInvolved)
      This method updates an existing record that is in the database's Appointments table; the new details for this record (as in, the new values for this record) are input as parameters into this method.
      Parameters:
      appointmentID - The ID number of the appointment (appointment record) that is to be modified
      appointmentName - The new title that will replace the old title for the appointment being modified
      appointmentDescription - The new description that will replace the old description for the appointment being modified
      appointmentLocation - The new location that will replace the old location for the appointment being modified
      appointmentType - The new appointment type that will replace the old type for the appointment being modified
      appointmentStartDate - The new start date that will replace the old start date for the appointment being modified
      appointmentEndDate - The new end date that will replace the old end date for the appointment being modified
      appointmentStartTime - The new start time that will replace the old start time of the appointment being modified. The format should be HH:MM:SS.ns (this is 24-hour time; "ns" stands for "nanoseconds").
      appointmentEndTime - The new end time that will replace the old end time of the appointment being modified. The format should be HH:MM:SS.ns (this is 24-hour time; "ns" stands for "nanoseconds").
      idOfCustomerInvolved - The customer ID of the customer involved in the appointment that is being modified. This value will replace the old value.
      idOfUserInCharge - The user ID of the user involved in the appointment that is being modified. This value will replace the old value.
      idOfContactInvolved - The contact ID of the contact involved in the appointment that is being modified. This value will replace the old value.
      Returns:
      Returns the number of table rows affected (updated) in the database

    • deleteAppointmentFromDatabase

      public static int deleteAppointmentFromDatabase(int appointmentID)
      This method deletes the record that has the given appointment ID from the database's Appointments table.
      Parameters:
      appointmentID - The ID of the appointment record that is to be deleted
      Returns:
      Returns the number of table rows affected (deleted) from the database
